com.inherentgames

Class JPCTBulletMotionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bulletphysics.linearmath.MotionState
      • com.inherentgames.JPCTBulletMotionState

  • public class JPCTBulletMotionState
extends com.bulletphysics.linearmath.MotionState
    Author:
    Tyler A helper class for JPCT-AE to work with jBullet, shouldn't need to be modified. See http://www.jpct.net/wiki/index.php/Physics for more details.
